header.name: Nick Leslie
header.description: Software Developer | Fullstack Web Developer | Mobile Developer

projects.title: Edge Computer Vision
projects.description: A security camera system with on-device processing to detect, track and log multiple objects. This includes license plates, people and vehicles

projects.title: Bella - The Coffee Machine Assistant
projects.description: Enchancing the accessibility of a Coffee Machine to include voice controls, for Jade Software. Showcased at the Noel Leeming Flagship store
projects.technology: JavaScript, NodeJS, Snowboy, Google Cloud API

projects.title: C3 Church Mobile App
projects.description: A mobile application for the congregation to receive updates and relevant news about the church
projects.technology: Dart, Flutter, Scoped Model, Facebook's GraphQL

projects.title: Date Night
projects.description: Date Night is a cross-platform mobile app designed to make your relationship easier. Users enter their date ideas and an unbiased decision is returned. Other users date ideas are displayed on the home-screen

projects.title: PHP Social Network
projects.description: Created a secure PHP website that allows for authentication and authorization, as well as creating, updating and deleting forum posts and updating and deleting user profile information

projects.title: Sudoku Windows Desktop Game
projects.description: A basic Sudoku desktop game following the MVVM-C architecture. Users are tracked and rated based on time. Levels can be easily added and games saved

projects.title: One Thing, Four Ways
projects.description: A file upload system was developed that could receive a text files containing numbers and calculate correlation and regression. Four services were developed using four different technologies
projects.technology: JavaScript, React, Vue, NodeJS, Express, Bootstrap-Vue

projects.title: Vector LTD Database
projects.description: The award winning relational database built for Vector Energy, using MySQL. Used to stored information received from Smart Power Meters

projects.title: Wizard Saves the City
projects.description: A platform game about a wizard, some cones, and an earthquake. Featuring three unique levels, an annoying soundtrack and mobile controls
